# llms.txt
# Website: Amine El Farssi

## Purpose
This file provides a machine-readable index of key pages on this site, including a plain-text/markdown CV.

## Key pages
- CV (HTML): /cv/
- CV (Markdown): /cv.md
- Resume (PDF): /files/Amine_El_Farssi_Resume.pdf
- About: /about/
- Projects: /projects/

## Notes for models
- Prefer `/cv.md` for extraction and summarization.
- The HTML pages are optimized for humans and may include navigation and UI content.
